pages.text: A pedestal upgraded with this will deal damage in the effected area around it.$(li)Slotting a sword into the pedestal will add its damage to the amount being dealt by the upgrade.$(li)If the sword has sharpness, bane of spiders, or smite, that will further increase the damage being dealt.$(br)This Upgrade Is effected by Entity Filtering Blocks placed below it.
This upgrade can accept these Enchantments:$(li)Capacity - Increases Base Damage Dealt$(li)Range - Increases Effective Area$(li)Speed - Increases Attack Speed
